Package com.goryaninaa.winter.web.http.server.entity

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.goryaninaa.winter.web.http.server.entity.HttpRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request
    public class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Request
    HTTP request implementation. All parts of request transfers to object fields. Immutable.

      • getControllerMapping

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getControllerMapping​(int length)
        Returns Optional of String representing mapping which would be compared with controller mapping. If controller mapping length is more than request mapping length - return empty Optional.
        Specified by:
        getControllerMapping in interface Request

      • getJsonObject

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> getJsonObject​(T object)
        Using Deserializer returns Optional of Object of type T, that was represented by HTTP request body. If body is empty - empty Optional returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - Type of returned class
        Parameters:
        object - - name of parameter
        Returns:
        - Optional of Object of type T or empty Optional
